docs.lead_paragraph: At Bedford Station, N.Y., a delightfully situated little village in the lower part of the Berkshire Hills, the country sanitarium of the Montefiore Home for Chronic Invalids was formally opened yesterday afternoon. The occasion was especially noteworthy because of the sum realized by contributions of the visitors toward the sanitarium, which aggregated over $7,600.

headline.main: MONTEFIORE COUNTRY HOME; Many New Yorkers Attend the Formal Opening of the Bedford Station Sanitarium. A HANDSOME SUM REALIZED Friends of the Institution Subscribe Over $7,600 for Its Maintenance -- Jacob H. Schiff and the Rev. Dr. Gottheil Speak.
